Brotherhood - Our Landmarks

Alpha Chi Rho’s basic principles are found in the Landmarks, formed by the Founders of the Fraternity over a century ago. They culminate in the noble traditions of Alpha Chi Rho and represent what our Founders believed was the ideal Brotherhood.

  1. Membership from among those who are prepared to realize in word and deed, the Brotherhood of all men.
  2. The insistence on a high and clean moral standard.
  3. The paramount duty of Brotherly love among members.
  4. Judgment not by externals, but by intrinsic worth; no one is denied membership in Alpha Chi Rho because of race, creed, or nationality.

These are the Landmarks of Alpha Chi Rho; its foundation and its heritage. The ideals which they express are to be lived out by every Brother of Alpha Chi Rho, not only during his college days, but also throughout his life. They are summarized in the exoteric motto of the Fraternity:

ΑΝΔΡΙΖΕΣΘΕ - "Be Men" - (Pronounced: An-DREE-zes-theh)

Recruitment

Welcome to Alpha Chi Rho-Delta Sigma Phi Chapter recruitment. Joining our Social Fraternity is a great way to learn crucial life skills outside of the classroom. We believe in positively impacting the community while ensuring our members experience personal, academic and professional growth. We can’t wait to meet all of our potential members.

Philanthropy - Making a Difference

The members of Alpha Chi Rho-Delta Sigma Phi Chapter hold philanthropy very close to their hearts. Our chapter is pleased to continue our partnerships with philanthropic organizations, and we are proud to be making a difference in the lives of many. The following are the primary organizations that we work with.

FEED THE CHILDREN AUTISM SOCIETY OF AMERICA CHILDREN'S WISH FOUNDATION AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY HABITAT FOR HUMANITY
